bio_en: CHARISSA combines expertise with kindness, guiding pupils through hands-on activities and reflective learning.
bio_ms: CHARISSA menggabungkan kepakaran dengan keprihatinan, membimbing murid melalui aktiviti berasaskan amali dan pembelajaran reflektif.

bio_en: AHMAD brings passion and clarity to the English Department, inspiring students to develop confidence and practical skills.
bio_ms: AHMAD membawa semangat dan kejelasan dalam English Department, menginspirasi murid membina keyakinan dan kemahiran praktikal.
